words.source: H3808 neg. particle; all trans. agree
H3254 Hiphil impf. 2mp + paragogic nun of יָסַף 'to add, continue'; KJV 'shall ye no more', ESV 'you shall no longer', NASB 'you are no longer to'
H5414 prep. l- + Qal inf. constr. of נָתַן 'to give'; KJV 'give', ESV 'give', NASB 'give'
H8401 n.ms תֶּבֶן 'straw, chopped straw'; KJV 'straw', ESV 'straw', NASB 'straw'
H5971 prep. l- + def. art. + n.ms עַם 'people'; KJV 'to the people', ESV 'to the people', NASB 'to the people'
H3835 prep. l- + Qal inf. constr. of לָבַן 'to make bricks'; KJV 'to make brick', ESV 'to make bricks', NASB 'to make bricks'
H3843 def. art. + n.fp לְבֵנָה 'brick'; KJV 'brick', ESV 'bricks', NASB 'bricks'
H8543 prep. k- + adv. תְּמוֹל 'yesterday, formerly'; KJV 'heretofore', ESV 'as in the past', NASB 'as previously'
H8032 adv. שִׁלְשׁוֹם 'three days ago, formerly'; idiom with תְּמוֹל = 'previously'; all trans. agree
H1992 indep. pron. 3mp הֵם 'they'; KJV 'let them', ESV 'let them', NASB 'let them'
H3212 Qal jussive 3mp of הָלַךְ 'to go'; KJV 'go', ESV 'go', NASB 'go'
H7197 conj. + Polel perf. 3cp of קָשַׁשׁ 'to gather stubble'; KJV 'gather', ESV 'gather', NASB 'collect'
prep. l- + 3mp suff.; KJV 'for themselves', ESV 'for themselves', NASB 'for themselves'
H8401 n.ms תֶּבֶן 'straw'; all trans. agree
